original_title: JD Vance nails it: "The idea that Gavin Newsom is somehow going to mimic Donald Trump's style, that ignores the fundamental genius of President Trump's political success, which is that he's authentic. He just is who he is." (everyday I love JD more and more)  — The Donald
article_summary: "JD Vance criticizes Gavin Newsom for attempting to mimic Donald Trump's style, with users on a post suggesting Newsom lacks authenticity and is compared to the fictional serial killer character Patrick Bateman. Critics also question Newsom's handling of California's homeless problem."</s>
